channel.title: Help on changing Client Name
channel.description:
hi i have a client i downloaded and i was wondering when the client is open and at the top in the blue bar it says the name of the client how do i change that to somthing else
Also how do i change the size of the client so when it opens it takes up more of the screen[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 02, 2008, 04:21:33 am[/size][hr]is anyone gonna help or is everyone just practiceing there reading skills

item.title: Help on changing Client Name
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

just got to Applet_Sub1.java (client folder) then search

Class108.aFrame1832.setTitle

Read full topic

item.title: Help on changing Client Name
item.dc:creator: @bencorbett bencorbett
item.description:
@bencorbett wrote:

You can change the title of your client in Frame_Sub1.java (For non-refactored), or RSFrame.java (For refactored clients).
You’ll see something like

setTitle("CLIENTS CURRENT TITLE HERE")

Just change the text between the quotation marks, so it looks something like

setTitle("My Client");

Also, to resize your client requires alot more knowledge.
You can change the size of the window frame easily, but the client won’t stretch to fill it and you’ll have clicking area problems.

Read full topic
